name: Snake Plant
description: A hardy indoor plant with sword-like leaves, ideal for low light and poor air quality.

name: Spider Plant
description: Easy-care hanging plant with arching leaves and baby plantlets.

name: Peace Lily
description: Elegant plant with white flowers, excellent for improving indoor air quality.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Succulent known for its medicinal gel and drought resistance.

name: Money Plant
description: Popular vine said to bring prosperity, grows easily in soil or water.

name: Rubber Plant
description: Attractive indoor tree with large, glossy leaves; prefers bright light.

name: Areca Palm
description: Tropical palm ideal for interiors; known for its feathery fronds.

name: ZZ Plant
description: Low-maintenance plant with waxy leaves; thrives in low light.

name: Jade Plant
description: Succulent with thick, oval leaves; symbolizes good luck and fortune.

name: Boston Fern
description: Lush fern with feathery fronds, ideal for humid and shaded areas.

name: Lavender
description: Fragrant herb used in aromatherapy and oils; prefers full sun.

name: Bamboo Palm
description: Compact indoor palm known for purifying air and soft green stems.

name: Pothos
description: Trailing vine with heart-shaped leaves, very adaptable and easy to grow.

name: Calathea
description: Decorative plant with striking leaf patterns, prefers humidity and shade.

name: Chinese Evergreen
description: Tolerant of low light and poor air, perfect for beginner plant owners.
